comments.body: Why were these changes not moved to a documentation commit? These are non-functional changes and should not be in this commit.

You did the same when you add the batch read/write capability, didn't you? `TableCapability#STREAMING_WRITE` is added in this PR and I have to add related document at the places that need to mention it.

I don't see any changes in the [read/write capability PR](https://github.com/apache/spark/pull/24012/files) that changed unrelated files with only documentation, unless the previous version had links to classes that were deleted. You were right that the changes to `Scan` are needed because the links would otherwise break and that PR made a similar change.

But the change here and the change to `Table` are not required and should be done in documentation PRs.
